alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 13 at 2:50PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NEARLY ALL THE COMBINED PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham... Potter...Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall... Armstrong...Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...Out of the southwest at 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...Values between 3 and 6 are expected across a majority of the Panhandles, with values of 7 possible in the Oklahoma and northern Texas Panhandles. * Timing...Wednesday morning through the late afternoon hours.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
